messages.content: DeepECT (pronounced as "Deep-IQ") is a deep learning-based platform that provides an AI-powered solution for enterprise customer service. DeepECT enables businesses to automate customer service tasks, such as answering customer questions and providing customer support, using natural language processing and machine learning algorithms.
